title: Emmerdale makes reference to Jeff Hordley and Zoe Henry’s real-life marriage
text:
Emmerdale made a little nod to Jeff Hordley’s marriage to fellow actor Zoe Henry during last night’s episode.

During said episode, Cain Dingle’s world came crashing down, as mum Faith (Sally Dexter) informed him that Moira (Natalie J Robb) has been having a streamy affair behind his back.

While viewers know that Nate (Jurrell Carter) is the person whom Moira is sleeping with, Faith put two and two together and presumed that Pete (Anthony Quinlan) was her other man.

Unwilling to believe Faith’s accusations, Cain stated how Pete ‘couldn’t keep hold of the vet’. Such a comment is in reference to Pete’s year long relationship with Rhona — which came to an end earlier this year as the couple realised that, in spite of being in love with one another, they wanted different things.

Of course, the interesting thing about Cain’s comment is that Rhona is portrayed by Jeff’s real-life wife, Zoe — which is something that viewers wasted little time point out on social media.

Cain mentionin Rhona in Emmerdale. — damo18 (@damo184) October 22, 2019

“He couldn’t even keep hold of the vet” Cain mate that’s your other wife 😂😉 #Emmerdale — Emmerdale News (@News4Emmerdale) October 21, 2019

While it was nothing more than a fleeting mention — as the drama continued for Cain as he sought vengeance on Pete in subsequent scenes — it certainly didn’t go unnoticed with viewers.

Interestingly, this isn’t the first time that Emmerdale has made reference to Jeff and Zoe’s real-life relationship either, as — a couple of years back — Rhona revealed that Cain would be her fantasy one-night-stand.

What’s more, Cain made an attempt to chat Rhona up when she first arrived in the village all the way back in 2001.

The drama continues in the Dales tonight, as Cain seeks revenge on Nate after Peter informed him that the new farmhand was having an affair with his wife.

Emmerdale continues Tuesday 22nd October 7pm on ITV.
